summary: This document is an email chain from August 2019 discussing an Epstein victim in West Palm Beach who is distressed by Epstein's suicide and media attention, and is in need of counseling services. The correspondence involves arranging outreach to the victim.

persons.name: Sony
persons.context: Addressed in the email as the recipient of a late-night message regarding contact with an Epstein victim.

events.title: Epstein's Suicide Aftermath
events.description: The suicide of Jeffrey Epstein and the subsequent media attention are reported to have severely affected one of his victims, prompting a need for counseling services.

keyFacts: An Epstein victim in West Palm Beach was severely affected by Epstein's suicide and constant media attention at her house.
The victim was in need of counseling services as of August 2019.
Communication was being coordinated to arrange outreach and support for the victim.
